scripts.start: concurrently "cd uni-helper-backend && npm start" "cd uni-helper-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:root: npm ci --also=dev && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf uni-helper-backend/public && rm -rf uni-helper-backend/dist && rm -rf uni-helper-backend/.cache
